rows.label: qst201104_msg0001
rows.name: Another note...? What now?

rows.label: qst201104_msg0002
rows.name:
Now defeat the monsters inhabiting
these locations:

rows.label: qst201104_msg0003
rows.name:
The Magno Blant near Sternum Arch
in Invidia...

rows.label: qst201104_msg0004
rows.name:
the Bodom Grebel near
Underground River Lavi in
Spirit Crucible Elpys...

rows.label: qst201104_msg0005
rows.name:
and the Cherys Medooz on the
Lud Cloudway of the Liberalitan
Archipelago.

rows.label: qst201104_msg0006
rows.name:
When you have defeated these
monsters, come to Nharil Central
Plaza in Superbia.

rows.label: qst201104_msg0007
rows.name:
Follow these instructions and you
are sure to regain your memories.

rows.label: qst201104_msg0008
rows.name:
First a treasure hunt, now a monster
hunt?

rows.label: qst201104_msg0009
rows.name:
I don't get what they think they'll
hope to achieve by us doing this.

rows.label: qst201104_msg0010
rows.name: I just don't get it...

rows.label: qst201104_msg0011
rows.name: Mikumari? What's your take on this?

rows.label: qst201104_msg0012
rows.name:
I'm just thinking... Maybe these
notes are meant for me?

rows.label: qst201104_msg0013
rows.name:
These memories it talks about...
Couldn't it have something to do with
the memories of my former self?

rows.label: qst201104_msg0014
rows.name: What makes you think that?

rows.label: qst201104_msg0015
rows.name: Hmm... It's just a hunch, really.

rows.label: qst201104_msg0016
rows.name:
But I get the feeling I'm supposed to be
the one following these instructions.

rows.label: qst201104_msg0017
rows.name:
Look at the weapons they keep
throwing. Lances. I use lances.

rows.label: qst201104_msg0018
rows.name:
So are you gonna keep going along
with this?

rows.label: qst201104_msg0019
rows.name:
I think so, yeah. If you think I should
stop, though, I'll stop.

rows.label: qst201104_msg0020
rows.name:
I'd just really like to know what's
going on in their mind.

rows.label: qst201104_msg0021
rows.name:
Nah, I'm still with you, Mikumari. Let's
roll with this hunch you've got.

rows.label: qst201104_msg0022
rows.name:
And hey, you might actually get your
memories back like it says. No harm
in trying.

rows.label: qst201104_msg0023
rows.name: I guess we're going then!
